channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘The Last of Us’ Season 2, Episode 2 Recap: Revenge
item.description: The major twist in this week’s episode is sure to have all kinds of fallout. One consequence is certain: The show will never be the same.

item.title: How Will a New Pope Be Chosen After Francis’ Death?
item.description: Many of the rituals and procedures of selecting a new pope — designed to ensure secrecy and an orderly transition — have remained unchanged for centur...

item.title: Geopolitics helps drive Middle Eastern money to Asia as wealthy Gulf investors hedge their bets
item.description: The Middle East missed Asia's rise the first time around. They don't want to miss out again.

item.title: 10 TV Character Deaths That Shocked Fans Through History
item.description: The big twist in “The Last of Us” this week wasn’t the first to completely upend a TV show and its fandom. Here’s a look at some other notable exits.

item.title: Who’s running the Catholic church until a new pope is chosen? Meet Kevin.
item.description: Cardinal Kevin Joseph Farrell is currently the most powerful man at the Vatican.

item.title: As L.A. Emerges From Wildfires, Can Its Mayor Recover, Too?
item.description: Los Angeles is rebuilding, but new crises are mounting and Mayor Karen Bass has been haunted by her absence when the fires started. It’s unclear wheth...

item.title: Who Is Kevin Farrell, the Vatican’s New De Facto Administrator?
item.description: Cardinal Farrell, who holds the position of cardinal chamberlain, or camerlengo in Italian, will run the Holy See’s affairs until a new pope is chosen...

item.title: That ‘Last of Us’ Scene Stunned Gamers and Sapped the Games
item.description: Five years ago, the video game series that inspired the HBO show leaned into violence and pain, cutting short its exploration of love.

item.title: Latest Updates: World Pays Tribute to Pope Francis

item.title: On Busy Last Day, Pope Francis Met JD Vance and Gave an Easter Blessing
item.description: The pontiff had remained surprisingly active despite twice nearly dying in respiratory crises earlier this year.

item.title: Southeast Asia’s Muslim market comes of age—and authenticity is in
item.description: From banking to fashion, local businesses are targeting a growing middle-class consumer base keen to buy 'halal'.

item.title: Malaysia aspires to provide the backbone of the global AI boom. Will the bet pay off?
item.description: Malaysia's Johor once grew black pepper, rubber and oil palm. Now it's focused on a new kind of cash crop: data to feed AI's voracious appetite.

item.title: How DeepSeek, deep pockets, and data centers are giving Asia an AI edge
item.description: Investors, executives and Silicon Valley discount the influence of this vast and dynamic region at their peril.
